title: [Large-Scale] Simulation-Based Instructional Design for Language Knowledge Reinforcement and Automation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Language Structure and Grammar
context.additional_context: Promoting internalization of language knowledge through VR simulations and personalized assignments in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply grammatical rules with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment
Based on automated vocabulary utilization skills, learners can make contextually appropriate word choices within 3 minutes
By integrating declarative and procedural knowledge, learners can perform creative writing tasks of approximately 500 characters
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
